intro: Psychotria sylvieana, commonly known as the Sierra Leone psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to West Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded forest understories, often in tropical rainforests. Psychotria sylvieana is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical significance in traditional medicine.
